body.name: Cuisinart TOB-135W Deluxe Convection Toaster Oven Broiler, White (Certified Refurbished)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 34 mins
features: FEATURES: White door and brushed stainless steel exterior. Comes with a slide-out crumb tray, baking tray and broiling rack. 1800 watts of power and BPA free.
COOKING FUNCTIONS: Multiple cooking functions with digital controls and a large blue backlit display. Cooking functions are Toasting, Cooking, Convection, Defrost, and Reheat.

EASY TO USE: Nonstick interior makes cleaning your oven easy and hassle free. Digital Controls with clock and 2-hour timer and an Automatic shutoff. Adjustable thermostat temperatures range from 200-450F° for cooking and 500F° for broiling.
SPACIOUS CAPACITY: Generous 0.6 cubic-foot allows you to toast 6 slices of bread, toast 4 bagel slices, bake a 12-inch pizza, roast a 4 pound chicken, and roast a 1.5 pounder tenderloin.
body.description: FeaturesThe white door and brushed stainless steel exterior give the oven the perfect modern look. With a slide-out crumb tray, baking tray and broiling rack, the oven is easy to use and even easier to clean. And if you're not sure what you want to make, there's a recipe book that comes with the oven, giving you great ideas for your next meal. The 1800 watts of power will ensure your food comes out quickly and well done. Don't worry its BPA free, so you can enjoy your food knowing you are safe from harmful chemicals.Advanced Cooking TechnologyThere are multiple cooking functions with digital controls and a large blue backlit display that ensure& exact results. The Toasting Functions works for Toast and Bagel. With the Cooking Functions you can Warm, Bake or Broil. The Convection Functions which allows for much faster cooking times as well as more consistent heating for superior results can be used for Convection Bake and Convection Broil. Reheat function is probably the best one yet, since it is perfect for leftovers. There is also a Defrost functions and 3 rack positions for greater flexibility in cooking options. This unit can be can be used with or without convection cooking.Exact Heat sensor maintains precise oven temperature for perfectly cooked meals every time. The Always Even Toast Shade Control offers consistent toasting results.Convenient and Easy to UseNonstick interior makes cleaning your oven easy and hassle free. Digital Controls with a clock and 2-hour timer and an Automatic shutoff make operation simple and intuitive. Adjustable thermostat temperatures range from 200-450F° for cooking and 500F° for broiling.Spacious CapacityGenerous 0.6 cubic-foot oven space allows you to toast 6 slices of bread, toast 4 bagel slices, bake a 12-inch pizza, roast a 4 pound chicken,and roast a 1.5 pounder tenderloin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Second One - Use It Daily
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the first one of these new. I had it for 2.5 years before I needed to toss it as it was really hard to clean the inside, despite lining the bottom with foil. It just looked really bad. But I loved it so much, that I bought it again, reconditioned, hoping it would be okay. It is.It came with all the parts and manual. I use it to not only toast, but I cook single pieces of chicken, steak, pork chops in it, etc. I also bake. You can cook meat from frozen in this oven. Works very well. But, as a precaution, now I create a foil tent with an opening at the top, and cook the meat that way so that the sides and front won't be splattered with grease. So hopefully, I can make this one stay looking nice and neat for a few years or more.Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This oven is easy to use
reviews.reviewText: We like, it's a keeper. Easy to operate once you get the basic idea of how it is programed very easy just follow the flashing buttons and push start. AND IT's mostly white!!!
